bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names bei yang chuang 悲羊瘡 , sorrow sheep sores. Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions with moisture covering cheeks and the entire top of the head and possibly reaching to the two ears. They itch and produce liquid, with irregular periods of activity and dormancy. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zi wei 紫葳 quoting Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 走皮趨瘡：滿頰滿頂，浸淫濕爛，延及兩耳，癢而 出水，發歇不定 , “ Sores running through the skin cover cheeks and the entire top of the head with soaking moisture and festering extending to the two ears. They itch and produce liquid, with irregular periods of activity and dormancy”.
